title: Need help with this read below
body: ok so i open lol everything fine then i get in a game then just before it gets in a game to the loading screen my pc will litreally lag like for 1 min untill it works again and my mouse sensitivity will drop 2 levels and i have to fix it everytime can someone help me fix this

replies.body: What OS are you on? Do you have any drivers installed for your mouse?
